body:
See code example below. I can provide a test ``.tif`` if necessary. May also happen with other file formats. Only tested with ``.tif``.

```
$ gmt grdinfo BathymetryExport-dtm.tif
BathymetryExport-dtm.tif: Title: Grid imported via GDAL
BathymetryExport-dtm.tif: Command: 
BathymetryExport-dtm.tif: Remark: 
BathymetryExport-dtm.tif: Pixel node registration used [Cartesian grid]
BathymetryExport-dtm.tif: Grid file format: gd = Import/export through GDAL
BathymetryExport-dtm.tif: x_min: 245787.5 x_max: 302712.5 x_inc: 25 name: x n_columns: 2277
BathymetryExport-dtm.tif: y_min: 8155337.5 y_max: 8193312.5 y_inc: 25 name: y n_rows: 1519
BathymetryExport-dtm.tif: v_min: -3303.82006836 v_max: -1646.84997559 name: z
BathymetryExport-dtm.tif: scale_factor: 1 add_offset: 0
+proj=utm +zone=33 +ellps=GRS80 +towgs84=0,0,0,0,0,0,0 +units=m +no_defs 

$ mv  BathymetryExport-dtm.tif BathymetryExport-dtm

$ gmt grdinfo BathymetryExport-dtm
ERROR: Caught signal number 11 (Segmentation fault) at
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(gmtlib_is_esri_grid+0x75)[0x7f58b38dd985]
[0x0]
Stack backtrace:
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(sig_handler+0x26e)[0x7f58b38862ae]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0(+0x12730)[0x7f58b3329730]
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(gmtlib_is_esri_grid+0x75)[0x7f58b38dd985]
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(gmt_grd_get_format+0x3ad)[0x7f58b38f106d]
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(gmtlib_read_grd_info+0x1f)[0x7f58b38f15df]
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(+0x5bc60)[0x7f58b38acc60]
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(GMT_Read_Data+0xfd7)[0x7f58b38be167]
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(GMT_grdinfo+0x1d24)[0x7f58b3b09714]
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(GMT_Call_Module+0x3ee)[0x7f58b38a481e]
gmt(main+0x260)[0x55b670f70430]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(__libc_start_main+0xeb)[0x7f58b0e1a09b]
gmt(_start+0x2a)[0x55b670f714aa]

$ gmt grdimage BathymetryExport-dtm
ERROR: Caught signal number 11 (Segmentation fault) at
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(gmtlib_is_esri_grid+0x75)[0x7fe1823db985]
[0x0]
Stack backtrace:
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(sig_handler+0x26e)[0x7fe1823842ae]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0(+0x12730)[0x7fe181e27730]
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(gmtlib_is_esri_grid+0x75)[0x7fe1823db985]
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(gmt_grd_get_format+0x3ad)[0x7fe1823ef06d]
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(gmtlib_read_grd_info+0x1f)[0x7fe1823ef5df]
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(GMT_grdimage+0x1345)[0x7fe182600205]
/usr/local/lib/libgmt.so.6(GMT_Call_Module+0x3ee)[0x7fe1823a281e]
gmt(main+0x260)[0x55b31b160430]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(__libc_start_main+0xeb)[0x7fe17f91809b]
gmt(_start+0x2a)[0x55b31b1614aa]
```
title: Tif-file: grdinfo and grdimage crashes when .tif-extension is removed
